resources.string:
We are looking for detailed oriented people to help us with a variety of market research related tasks. The scope of the job will be around using the Curbside App to make purchase at various retailers and send a written report to shoppingreports@shopcurbside.com of your experience. \nThe written report should include:
• Screenshots of your order, pickup ready email.
• Production selection.
• In App experience and user experience of App.

The written report should include: 
 • Screenshots of your order, pickup ready email. 
 • Production selection. 
 • In App experience and user experience of App.
